channel.title: Joining peoples servers?
channel.description:
:( Hello Everyone i am a noob! :(
I was just wondering if anyone would be willing to explain to me how too join other peoples moparscape and such clients, ive been trying to do this for a while but ive got nowhere if you can help me please post with insturctions or add my msn sythepwnage@hotmail.com!

item.title: Joining peoples servers?
item.dc:creator: @berky berky
item.description:
@berky wrote:

does not work for me it says no response from server

Read full topic

item.title: Joining peoples servers?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Open your moparscape client.
Go to “Help” and go to “Server Status”
A internet screen will appear with a list of ONLINE servers.
Go to “File” and “new server” Type in or copy one of the IP-addresses on the server status page.
Go to “File” and “New Port” Type in or copy the port of the server that you copied from the server status page.
Type in any username and password, and log in!!

Your Welcome,
Tico135

Read full topic
